block.p: LEAD: September wedding plans for Gabrielle Jesman von Henneberg and David Archibald Gillies, a son of Joy Gillies of Northport, L.I., and Archibald L. Gillies of New York, have been announced by the prospective bride's parents, Mrs. Robert P. Bass Jr. and Jacek von Henneberg, both of Cambridge, Mass.

LEAD: September wedding plans for Gabrielle Jesman von Henneberg and David Archibald Gillies, a son of Joy Gillies of Northport, L.I., and Archibald L. Gillies of New York, have been announced by the prospective bride's parents, Mrs. Robert P. Bass Jr. and Jacek von Henneberg, both of Cambridge, Mass.

September wedding plans for Gabrielle Jesman von Henneberg and David Archibald Gillies, a son of Joy Gillies of Northport, L.I., and Archibald L. Gillies of New York, have been announced by the prospective bride's parents, Mrs. Robert P. Bass Jr. and Jacek von Henneberg, both of Cambridge, Mass.

Miss von Henneberg, 29 years old, is a graduate of Hampshire College and the Fashion Institute of Technology. She is the principal of von Henneberg Ltd., a fashion accessories firm in Boston. Her father is an artist and a partner in the architectural firm of Henneberg & Henneberg in Cambridge. Her mother, Sara M. Bass, is a district court mediator for the Cambridge Dispute Settlement Center.

Mr. Gillies, 32, is the commercial leasing manager at the Northland Investment Corporation in Newton, Mass. He graduated from Boston University and the London School of Economics. His mother is an associate director for community services at the Pilgrim Psychiatric Center in West Brentwood, L.I. His father is the president of the Andy Warhol Foundation for the Visual Arts in New York.
